column2: CAI International, Inc. is a transportation finance and logistics company, which engages in the provision of intermodal shipping containers. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California and currently employs 261 full-time employees. The firm purchases equipment, primarily intermodal shipping containers and railcars, which it leases to its customers, and also manages equipment for third-party investors. The firm operates through three segments: container leasing, rail leasing and logistics. In operating the Company's fleet, it leases, re-leases and disposes equipment and contracts for the repair, repositioning and storage of equipment. The firm also provides domestic and international logistics services. The firm leases its container equipment to lessees under long-term leases, short-term leases and finance leases. The firm's long-term leases have terms of one year or more and specify the number of containers to be leased, the pick-up and drop-off locations.
